page.title: 18AGRICULTURE IN CH. MINSHULL
page.content: {HORSES AND PONIES}There are 21 animals All are used for recreation. {RABBITS}30 commercial. {ARABLE}10% of land. Half wheat and half barley. Yields average 3 tonnes/a {FARM WORKERS}The 10 farms are worked by 31 people, not including farmers' wives. 16 are fathers and sons, the rest are employed.The union rate is higher in Cheshire than in other areas. {EQUIPMENT} used on the 10 farms. TRACTORS 32 from 120 to 45 h.p. FERTILISER AND MANURE SPREADERS 1/farm COMBINE HARVESTER,ROLLER,CHAIN HARROW, MOWER,PLOUGH,DISC,CORN DRILL,SPRAYER 1/farm with arable land. PRECISION CHOPPER,SILAGE TRAILER,BUCK RAKE,ROWER-IN 1/farm making own silage LAND ROVERS 4 TRAILER for taking cattle to market 1/farm
